content: slash dot cowl when putting the skeins on the shelf i couldn t resist putting these two colors next to each other they complement one another so well now here they are united at last in this gorgeous cowl if these colors don t strike your fancy look for a solid or semi-solid when choosing your main color this cowl comes in two sizes a small one 22 inches around that fits close around your neck and a larger one 42 inches around that can be wrapped twice both cowls are 9 inches high but can be made taller if you choose yarn malabrigo mecha 1 2 skeins mc polar morn and1 1 skein cc anniversario needles us size 10 16 32 inch circular gauge 15 sts & 26 row per 4 inches in pattern finished measurements 22 42 inches in circumference x 9 inches high with us size 10 needles and mc co 88 168 join in round knit one round and purl one round begin pattern round 1 with cc *s1 with yarn in front k1 repeat from * to end of round round 2 with mc knit round 3 with cc * k1 s1 with yarn in front repeat from * to end of round round 4 with mc knit knit at least 9 inches from cast on edge or until cowl is desired height end with row 2 or 4 purl one round in mc bind off knitwise in mc weave in ends block lightly if desired photo post to ravelry stay warm
